title: How many galaxies can you see? This week's Silicon Tally
teaser: 3 hours. 20-50 photos. 50 students. 11 percent. 7 billionaires. 3 galaxies. 4 flavors. Do you know what these numbers mean?
description: 3 hours. 20-50 photos. 50 students. 11 percent. 7 billionaires. 3 galaxies. 4 flavors. Do you know what these numbers mean?
contentencoded:
3 hours. 20-50 photos. 50 students. 11 percent. 7 billionaires. 3 galaxies. 4 flavors.

The numbers mean it's time for Silicon Tally again, Marketplace Tech's weekly quiz.

This week, Ben puts NYMag.com columnist and maker of hilarious pie charts for The Hairpin Ann Friedman to the test.

 You can play along below. Click the audio player above to hear how Ann did.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, November 22, 2013
